CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 13, 1946, pg. 4, reads: "Condemned Home - Seventy-five-year-old Mrs. Hattie Dodson and her daughter, Mary Davenport, have occupied this home at 2325 Mahon Street (rear) for the past twelve years.  Now they must move.  They say they cannot find a house are are unable to work.  Arrow indicates bulge in the house. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Condemned frame home of Hattie Dodson and Mary Davenport, with door on second story, bulging wall, and outhouse on left, 2325 Mahon Street and Humber Way, Hill District
